notes.title: Authorsʼ contributions
notes.p: All three co-authors shared the drafting, writing and editing of the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Authorsʼ information
sec.p: JFG-B is currently a Principal Research Fellow in drug discovery and translation at the Melbourne Veterinary School, The University of Melbourne, Australia; his professional interests are the discovery of novel anti-infectives and their mechanism of action. BES is Laboratory Head in the Chemical Biology division of the Walter and Eliza Hall Institute, Melbourne, Australia, active in drug discovery and optimisation. RBG is Redmond Barry Distinguished Professor at the Melbourne Veterinary School, The University of Melbourne, Australia; his professional interests include genomics and transcriptomics of helminths and the discovery of novel anthelmintics.
